Ablative Coating.card_desc: [Poppy Bomb] Hitting an enemy with Poppy Bomb heals you for {scale=100|100}.

Air Blast.card_desc: [Poppy Bomb] Poppy Bomb increases your Air Control by {scale=10|10}% until you land.

Backdraft.card_desc: [Detonate] Reduce the cooldown of Poppy Bomb by {scale=0.1|0.1}s for every Sticky Bomb detonated.

Bomb Shelter.card_desc: [Weapon] Sticky Bombs deal {scale=20|20}% reduced Self Damage.

Chain Reaction.card_desc: [Detonate] When hitting an enemy with multiple bombs, each bomb after the first will deal 30% more damage.

Countdown.card_desc: [Grumpy Bomb] Reduce the cooldown of Grumpy Bomb by {scale=0.5|0.5}s.

Doomsday.card_desc: [Grumpy Bomb] Activating Grumpy Bomb heals you for {scale=50|50}.

Explosive Entrance.card_desc: [Poppy Bomb] Activating Poppy Bomb Heals you for {scale=50|50}.

Fallout.card_desc: [Grumpy Bomb] Hitting an enemy with Grumpy Bomb reduces the cooldown of Poppy Bomb by {scale=1|1}s.

Jolt.card_desc: [Poppy Bomb] Poppy Bomb has {scale=15|15}% increased Knockback against enemies and explodes on contact with any surface.

King's Court.card_desc: [Detonate] Heal for {scale=15|15} for every Sticky Bomb Detonated

Mad Bomber.card_desc: [Grumpy Bomb] Using Grumpy Bomb grants {scale=7|7}% Movement Speed for 2s.

Royal Decree.card_desc: [Detonate] Increase your Reload speed by {scale=5|5}% for 3s after using Detonate.

Royal Subjects.card_desc: [Weapon] Increase the explosion size of Sticky Bombs by 20%

Shock and Awe.card_desc: [Detonate] Getting a kill with Detonate grants {scale=10|10}% Movement Speed for 4s.

Uncontrolled.card_desc: [Armor] Kills reduce your active cooldowns by {scale=10|10}%.

Ablativer Belag.card_desc: [Puffbombe] Triffst du einen Gegner mit Puffbombe, wirst du {scale=100|100} LP geheilt.

Angst und Schrecken.card_desc: [Zünder] Kills mit Zünder erhöhen dein Lauftempo 4s lang um {scale=10|10}%.

Countdown.card_desc: [Grummelbombe] Reduziert die Abklingzeit von Grummelbombe um {scale=0.5|0.5}s.

Explosiver Auftritt.card_desc: [Puffbombe] Bei Aktivierung von Puffbombe wirst du {scale=50|50} LP geheilt.

Fallout.card_desc: [Grummelbombe] Treffer mit Grummelbombe reduzieren die Abklingzeit von Puffbombe um {scale=1|1}s.

Flammenexplosion.card_desc: [Zünder] Reduziert die Abklingzeit von Puffbombe für jede gezündete Haftbombe um {scale=0.1|0.1}s.

Hof des K\u00f6nigs.card_desc: [Zünder] Für jede gezündete Haftbombe wirst du {scale=15|15} LP geheilt.

Irrer Bomber.card_desc: [Grummelbombe] Die Aktivierung von Grummelbombe erhöht dein Lauftempo 2s lang um {scale=7|7}%.

Kettenreaktion.card_desc: [Zünder] Triffst du einen Gegner mit mehreren Bomben, fügt jede Bombe nach der ersten 30% mehr Schaden zu.

K\u00f6nigliche Untertanen.card_desc: [Waffe] Erhöht den Explosionsradius der Haftbomben um 20%.

K\u00f6niglicher Erlass.card_desc: [Zünder] Die Aktivierung von Zünder erhöht dein Nachladetempo 3s lang um {scale=5|5}%.

Luftschlag.card_desc: [Puffbombe] Puffbombe erhöht deine Luftkontrolle bis du landest um {scale=10|10}%.

Neuer K\u00f6nigsmantel.card_desc: [Rüstung] Erhöht deine maximale Gesundheit um {scale=50|50} LP.

Schock.card_desc: [Puffbombe] Die Puffbombe explodiert bei Kontakt mit einer Oberfläche und verursacht bei Gegnern um {scale=15|15}% erhöhten Rückstoß.

Weltuntergang.card_desc: [Grummelbombe] Bei Aktivierung von Grummelbombe wirst du {scale=50|50} LP geheilt.

Abri anti-bombe.card_desc: [Arme] Les Bombes collantes vous infligent {scale=20|20}% de dégâts en moins.

Artificier f\u00eal\u00e9.card_desc: [Bombe grognon] Bombe grognon augmente votre vitesse de {scale=7|7}% pendant 2s.

Choc et effroi.card_desc: [Explosion] Chaque exécution avec Explosion augmente votre vitesse de {scale=10|10}% pendant 4s.

Compte \u00e0 rebours.card_desc: [Bombe grognon] Bombe grognon se recharge {scale=0.5|0.5}s plus vite.

Contre-explosion.card_desc: [Explosion] Chaque Bombe collante qui explose réduit le temps de recharge de Bombe paf de {scale=0.1|0.1}s.

Couche ablative.card_desc: [Bombe paf] Bombe paf vous rend {scale=100|100} PV si elle touche un ennemi.

Cour royale.card_desc: [Explosion] Chaque Bombe collante qui explose vous rend {scale=15|15} PV.

D\u00e9cret royal.card_desc: [Explosion] Explosion augmente votre vitesse de rechargement de {scale=5|5}% pendant 3s.

Entr\u00e9e explosive.card_desc: [Bombe paf] Bombe paf vous rend {scale=50|50} PV.

Explosion a\u00e9rienne.card_desc: [Bombe paf] Bombe paf augmente votre contrôle aérien de {scale=10|10}%.

Incontr\u00f4lable.card_desc: [Armure] Chaque exécution réduit les temps de recharge en cours de {scale=10|10}%.

Jugement dernier.card_desc: [Bombe grognon] Bombe grognon vous rend {scale=50|50} PV.

Pouss\u00e9e.card_desc: [Bombe grognon] La vitesse d'explosion de Bombe grognon augmente de 40%.

R\u00e9action en cha\u00eene.card_desc: [Explosion] Les Bombes collantes qui touchent la même cible infligent 30% de dégâts supplémentaires après la première.

R\u00e9percussion.card_desc: [Bombe grognon] Toucher un ennemi avec Bombe grognon réduit le temps de recharge de Bombe paf de {scale=1|1}s.

Soubresaut.card_desc: [Bombe paf] Bombe paf explose à l'impact. Contre les ennemis, son recul est {scale=15|15}% plus important.

Sujets de la Couronne.card_desc: [Arme] Le rayon d'explosion des Bombes collantes augmente de 20%.

\u5012\u8ba1\u65f6.card_desc: [狂暴炸弹] 减少狂暴炸弹的冷却时间{scale=0.5|0.5}秒

\u52a0\u56fa\u5916\u58f3.card_desc: [粘性炸弹] 获得{scale=14|14}%控制抗性和减速抗性

\u53cd\u6d41.card_desc: [引爆] 每引爆一颗粘性炸弹，罂粟炸弹的冷却时间就会降低{scale=0.1|0.1}秒

\u56fd\u738b\u7684\u65b0\u8863.card_desc: [护甲] 最大生命值提高{scale=50|50}点

\u5ba1\u5224\u65e5.card_desc: [狂暴炸弹] 使用狂爆炸弹时回复{scale=50|50}点生命值

\u6025\u901f\u51b2\u649e.card_desc: [罂粟炸弹] 罂粟炸弹对敌人造成的击退效果提高{scale=15|15}%，并且在接触任何目标或表面时都将直接引爆

\u6050\u6016\u7edf\u6cbb.card_desc: [引爆] 使用引爆击败敌人或助攻时将提升你的移动速度{scale=10|10}%，持续4秒

\u610f\u5916\u7206\u70b8.card_desc: [护甲] 你的移动速度无法被降至{scale=60|10}%以下

\u70e7\u707c\u5916\u58f3.card_desc: [罂粟炸弹] 罂粟炸弹命中一个敌人，自身回复{scale=100|100}点生命值

\u7206\u70b8\u767b\u573a.card_desc: [罂粟炸弹] 激活罂粟炸弹时回复{scale=50|50}点生命

\u7206\u70b8\u9632\u62a4.card_desc: [粘性炸弹] 粘性炸弹对自己造成的伤害降低{scale=20|20}%

\u738b\u5ead.card_desc: [引爆] 每个被引爆的粘性炸弹都将治疗你{scale=15|15}生命值

\u75af\u72c2\u6295\u5f39.card_desc: [狂暴炸弹] 使用狂爆炸弹后移动速度提高{scale=7|7}%，持续2秒

\u7687\u5bb6\u6cd5\u4ee4.card_desc: [引爆] 引爆炸弹后的3秒内增加{scale=5|5}%装填速度

\u7687\u5bb6\u8bd5\u9a8c\u54c1.card_desc: [武器] 粘性炸弹的爆炸范围提高30%

\u7a7a\u88ad.card_desc: [罂粟炸弹] 在你被罂粟炸弹击飞期间，空中操控能力提升{scale=10|10}%

\u8f90\u5c04.card_desc: [狂暴炸弹] 狂爆炸弹每命中一个敌人，罂粟炸弹的冷却时间就会降低{scale=1|1}秒

\u8fde\u9501\u53cd\u5e94.card_desc: [引爆] 当多个炸弹命中同一名敌人时，后续炸弹造成的伤害提高30%

\u9ad8\u7206\u89e6\u5a92.card_desc: [狂暴炸弹] 狂暴炸弹的引爆速度加快40%

Ablative Coating.card_desc: [Poppy Bomb] Increase the health of Poppy Bomb by {50}

Accelerant.card_desc: [Poppy Bomb] Increase the self Knockback of Poppy Bomb by 10%.

Air Blast.card_desc: [Poppy Bomb] You have {15}% more air control while airborne after hitting yourself with Poppy Bomb.

Backdraft.card_desc: [Poppy Bomb] Lower the Cooldown of Poppy Bomb by 1s if you only hit yourself with it.

Bomb Shelter.card_desc: [Sticky Bomb] Reduce the self damage you receive from Sticky Bombs by {25}%.

Countdown.card_desc: [Grumpy Bomb] Reduce the cooldown of Grumpy Bomb by {1}s.

Doomsday.card_desc: [Grumpy Bomb] Grumpy Bomb deals 100% more damage to shields.

Fallout.card_desc: [Grumpy Bomb] When Grumpy Bomb explodes he spawns an HP drop that heals for 100.

Flare.card_desc: [Weapon] Detonating Sticky Bombs reveals affected enemies for 2s.

Jolt.card_desc: [Poppy Bomb] Poppy Bomb explodes on contact and has a {10}% increased knockback against enemies.

King's Court.card_desc: [Grumpy Bomb] Heal for 200 health over 2s for each enemy hit by Grumpy Bomb, max {1} target.

Reinforced Casing.card_desc: [Sticky Bomb] Increase the health of Sticky Bomb by {25}.

Royal Army.card_desc: [Weapon] Eliminations increase your reload speed by {10}% for 5s.

Royal Decree.card_desc: [Poppy Bomb] Hitting yourself with Poppy Bomb heals you for {100} Health over 4s.

Shell Shock.card_desc: [Grumpy Bomb] Grumpy Bomb slows targets hit by 10% for 4s.

Shock and Awe.card_desc: [Poppy Bomb] After Poppy Bomb explodes, gain {15}% Movement Speed for 3s.

Acelerante.card_desc: [Bomba iracunda] Bomba iracunda explota un 40% más rápido.

Bombardero loco.card_desc: [Bomba iracunda] Bomba iracunda te otorga un {scale=7|7}% de velocidad de movimiento durante 2s.

Capa aislante.card_desc: [Bomba adormidera] Al alcanzar a un enemigo con Bomba adormidera, te curas {scale=100|100} PS.

Conmoci\u00f3n.card_desc: [Bomba adormidera] Bomba adormidera ahora repele a los enemigos un{scale=15|15}% más y explota al hacer contacto con cualquier superficie.

Corte de reyes.card_desc: [Detonación] Por cada Bomba pegajosa detonada, te curas {scale=15|15} PS

Cubierta reforzada.card_desc: [Armadura] Tu cantidad de munición aumenta en {scale=1|1}.

Cuenta regresiva.card_desc: [Bomba iracunda] Reduces su recarga en {scale=0.5|0.5} s.

Decreto real.card_desc: [Detonación] Después de usar Detonar tu Velocidad de recarga aumenta un {scale=2|2}% durante 3 s.

Descontrol.card_desc: [Armadura] Las bajas reducen tus recargas activas un {scale=10|10}%.

Dominio r\u00e1pido.card_desc: [Detonación] Tras una baja con Detonación, obtienes un {scale=10|10}% de velocidad de movimiento durante 4s.

Entrada explosiva.card_desc: [Bomba adormidera] Al activar Bomba adormidera, te curas {scale=50|50} PS.

Hurac\u00e1n.card_desc: [Bomba adormidera] Obtienes un {scale=10|10}% más de control en el aire hasta aterrizar.

Juicio final.card_desc: [Bomba iracunda] Al activar Bomba iracunda, te curas {scale=50|50} PS.

Reacci\u00f3n en cadena.card_desc: [Detonación] Tras golpear un objetivo con múltiples bombas, cada bomba después de la primera inflige un 30% más daño.

Refugio.card_desc: [Bomba iracunda] Al alcanzar a un enemigo, la recarga de Bomba adormidera se reduce en {scale=1|1} s.

Refugio antibombas.card_desc: [Arma] Las Bombas pegajosas infligen un {scale=20|20}% de Reducción de autodaño.

Sujetos reales.card_desc: [Arma] Aumenta el tamaño de la explosión de Bomba pegajosa un 20%.

Volatilidad.card_desc: [Detonación] Por cada Bomba pegajosa detonada, la recarga de Bomba adormidera se reduce en {scale=0.1|0.1} s.

Abrigo Antibomba.card_desc: [Arma] Reduz em {scale=20|20}% o dano autoinfligido pela Bomba Adesiva.

Acelerador.card_desc: [Bomba Ranzinza] A Bomba Ranzinza explode 40% mais rápido.

Bombardeiro Louco.card_desc: [Bomba Ranzinza] Usar a Bomba Ranzinza aumenta a velocidade de movimento em {scale=7|7}% por 2s.

Choque.card_desc: [Bomba Caseira] A Bomba Caseira explode ao encostar em qualquer superfície e causa {scale=15|15}% mais repulsão nos inimigos.

Contagem.card_desc: [Bomba Ranzinza] Reduz o intervalo da Bomba Ranzinza em {scale=0.5|0.5}s.

Corte do Rei.card_desc: [Detonador] Cura em {scale=15|15} por cada Bomba Adesiva detonada.

Decreto Real.card_desc: [Detonador] Recarrega a arma {scale=5|5}% mais rápido por 3s após usar o Detonador.

Descontrolado.card_desc: [Armadura] Eliminações reduzem em {scale=10|10}% seus intervalos ativos.

Dom\u00ednio R\u00e1pido.card_desc: [Detonador] Recebe {scale=10|10}% mais velocidade de movimento por 4s após uma eliminação com o Detonador.

Entrada Explosiva.card_desc: [Bomba Caseira] Ativar a Bomba Caseira te cura em {scale=50|50}.

Igni\u00e7\u00e3o Explosiva.card_desc: [Detonador] Reduz o intervalo da Bomba Caseira em {scale=0.1|0.1}s para cada Bomba Adesiva detonada.

Jato de Ar.card_desc: [Bomba Caseira] A Bomba Caseira aumenta o seu controle aéreo em {scale=10|10}% até você aterrissar.

Ju\u00edzo Final.card_desc: [Bomba Ranzinza] Arremessar a Bomba Ranzinza cura você em {scale=50|50}.

Rea\u00e7\u00e3o em Cadeia.card_desc: [Detonador] Quando um inimigo é acertado por mais de uma bomba, cada bomba depois da primeira a explodir causa 30% a mais de dano.

Ref\u00fagio.card_desc: [Bomba Ranzinza] Acertar inimigos com a Bomba Ranzinza reduz o intervalo da Bomba Caseira em {scale=1|1}s.

Revestimento Pesado.card_desc: [Bomba Caseira] Acertar um inimigo com a Bomba Caseira te cura em {scale=100|100}.

S\u00faditos Reais.card_desc: [Arma] Aumenta a área de explosão das Bombas Caseiras em 20%.

\u0410\u0431\u043b\u044f\u0446\u0438\u04.card_desc: [Хлопушка] Попадание по врагу Хлопушкой исцеляет вас на {scale=100|100} ед.

\u0411\u043e\u043c\u0431\u043e\u0443\u04.card_desc: [Оружие] Бомба-липучка наносит вам на {scale=20|20}% меньше урона.

\u0412\u043e\u0437\u0434\u0443\u0448\u04.card_desc: [Хлопушка] Хлопушка улучшает управление в воздухе на {scale=10|10}%, пока вы не приземлитесь.

\u0413\u0440\u043e\u043c\u043a\u0438\u04.card_desc: [Хлопушка] Активация Хлопушки исцеляет вас на {scale=50|50} ед.

\u041a\u043e\u0440\u043e\u043b\u0435\u04.card_desc: [Оружие] Область поражения при взрыве Бомбы-липучки увеличивается на 20%.
[Взрыв] После использования Взрыва скорость перезарядки увеличивается на {scale=5|5}% на 3 с.

\u041d\u0435\u0443\u043f\u0440\u0430\u04.card_desc: [Броня] Убийства сокращают текущую перезарядку способностей на {scale=10|10}%.

\u041e\u0431\u0440\u0430\u0442\u043d\u04.card_desc: [Угрюмая бомба] Перезарядка Угрюмой бомбы сокращается на {scale=0.5|0.5} с.
[Взрыв] Каждый взрыв Бомбы-липучки сокращает перезарядку Хлопушки на {scale=0.1|0.1} с.

\u041e\u0442\u0431\u0440\u0430\u043a\u04.card_desc: [Угрюмая бомба] Попадание по врагу Угрюмой бомбой сокращает перезарядку Хлопушки на {scale=1|1} с.

\u0421\u0443\u0434 \u043a\u043e\u0440\u0.card_desc: [Взрыв] Вы исцеляетесь на {scale=15|15} ед. за каждый взрыв Бомбы-липучки.

\u0421\u0443\u0434\u043d\u044b\u0439 \u0.card_desc: [Угрюмая бомба] Активация Угрюмой бомбы исцеляет вас на {scale=50|50} ед.

\u0422\u0440\u044f\u0441\u043a\u0430.card_desc: [Хлопушка] Хлопушка взрывается при контакте и увеличивает силу отбрасывания врагов на {scale=15|15}%.

\u0423\u0441\u043a\u043e\u0440\u0438\u04.card_desc: [Угрюмая бомба] Угрюмая бомба взрывается на 40% быстрее.

\u0426\u0435\u043f\u043d\u0430\u044f \u0.card_desc: [Взрыв] Если вы попадаете по врагу несколькими бомбами, каждая последующая бомба наносит на 30% больше урона.

\u0427\u043e\u043a\u043d\u0443\u0442\u04.card_desc: [Угрюмая бомба] Использование Угрюмой бомбы увеличивает вашу скорость передвижения на {scale=7|7}% на 2 с.

\u0428\u043e\u043a \u0438 \u0442\u0440\u.card_desc: [Взрыв] Убийство врага Взрывом увеличивает вашу скорость передвижения на {scale=10|10}% на 4 с.

Ablatywne okrycie.card_desc: [Makówka] Trafienie wroga Makówką przywraca ci {scale=100|100} PZ.

Dekret kr\u00f3la.card_desc: [Detonacja] Każda zdetonowana Lepka bomba na 3 s skraca czas przeładowania o {scale=5|5}%.

Drgni\u0119cie.card_desc: [Makówka] Makówka odrzuca wrogów o {scale=15|15}% silniej i wybucha przy kontakcie z dowolną powierzchnią.

Kr\u00f3lewscy poddani.card_desc: [Broń] Zwiększa rozmiar eksplozji Lepkiej bomby o 20%.

Kr\u00f3lewski dw\u00f3r.card_desc: [Detonacja] Przywraca {scale=15|15} PZ za każdy wybuch Lepkiej bomby.

Odliczanie.card_desc: [Zrzędliwa bomba] Skraca czas odnowienia Zrzędliwej bomby o {scale=0.5|0.5} s.

Opad radioaktywny.card_desc: [Zrzędliwa bomba] Trafienie wroga Zrzędliwą bombą skraca czas odnowienia Makówki o {scale=1|1} s.

Podmuch.card_desc: [Detonacja] Skraca czas odnowienia Makówki o {scale=0.1|0.1}s za każdą zdetonowaną Lepką bombę.

Powietrzny podmuch.card_desc: [Makówka] Zwiększa kontrolę lotu o {scale=10|10}%, dopóki nie wylądujesz.

Poza kontrol\u0105.card_desc: [Pancerz] Zabójstwa skracają aktywne czasy odnowienia o {scale=10|10}%.

Przyspieszacz.card_desc: [Zrzędliwa bomba] Zrzędliwa bomba wybucha o 40% szybciej.

Reakcja \u0142a\u0144cuchowa.card_desc: [Detonacja] Gdy trafiasz wroga kilkoma bombami, każda kolejna bomba zada 30% dodatkowych obrażeń.

Schron przeciwbombowy.card_desc: [Broń] Redukuje o {scale=20|20}% samoobrażenia od Lepkich bomb.

Szalony bomber.card_desc: [Zrzędliwa bomba] Użycie Zrzędliwej bomby zwiększa szybkość ruchu o {scale=7|7}% na 2 s.

Szok i przera\u017cenie.card_desc: [Detonacja] Zabicie za pomocą Detonacji zwiększa szybkość ruchu o {scale=10|10}% na 4 s.

A\u015f\u0131nm\u0131\u015f Kaplama.card_desc: [Kızıl Bomba] Kızıl Bomba ile bir düşmanı vurmak seni {scale=100|100} Can iyileştirir.

Bomba S\u0131\u011f\u0131na\u011f\u0131.card_desc: [Silah] Yapışkan Bombalar sana %{scale=20|20} daha az hasar verir.

\u00c7\u0131lg\u0131n Bombac\u0131.card_desc: [Aksi Bomba] Aksi Bomba'yı kullanmak 2 sn boyunca %{scale=7|7} Hareket Hızı verir.

Gerisay\u0131m.card_desc: [Aksi Bomba] Aksi Bomba'nın Bekleme Süresini {scale=0.5|0.5} sn azalt.

Hava Patlamas\u0131.card_desc: [Kızıl Bomba] Kızıl Bomba, sen inene kadar Hava Kontrolünü %{scale=10|10} artırır.

H\u0131zland\u0131r\u0131c\u0131.card_desc: [Aksi Bomba] Aksi Bomba %40 daha hızlı patlar

K\u0131yamet G\u00fcn\u00fc.card_desc: [Aksi Bomba] Aksi Bomba'yı etkinleştirmek seni {scale=50|50} Can iyileştirir.

Kral\u0131n Mahkemesi.card_desc: [Patlat] Patlatılan her Yapışkan Bomba için {scale=15|15} Can iyileş.

Kraliyet Ferman\u0131.card_desc: [Patlat] Patlat'ı kullandıktan sonra Yeniden Doldurma hızını 3 sn boyunca %{scale=5|5} artır.

N\u00fckleer Kal\u0131nt\u0131.card_desc: [Aksi Bomba] Bir düşmanı Aksi Bomba ile vurmak Kızıl Bomba'nın Bekleme Süresini {scale=1|1} sn azaltır.

Patlay\u0131c\u0131 Giri\u015f.card_desc: [Kızıl Bomba] Kızıl Bomba'yı etkinleştirmek seni {scale=50|50} Can iyileştirir.

Sarsma.card_desc: [Kızıl Bomba] Kızıl Bomba düşmanlara karşı %{scale=15|15} daha yüksek Geri İtmeye sahiptir ve herhangi bir yüzeyle temas ettiğinde patlar.

\u015eok ve Deh\u015fet.card_desc: [Patlat] Patlat ile bir katletme yaptığında 4 sn boyunca %{scale=10|10} Hareket Hızı kazanırsın.

Yang\u0131n.card_desc: [Patlat] Kızıl Bomba'nın Bekleme Süresini, patlatılan her Yapışkan Bomba için {scale=0.1|0.1} sn azalt.

Zincirleme Tepki.card_desc: [Patlat] Düşmanı birden fazla bomba ile vururken ilk bombadan sonraki her bomba %30 daha fazla hasar verir.
